weather_report:
This morning in Boston, a gentle cloak of clouds stretches across the sky, lending the city a serene, muted ambiance, as if it were wrapped in soft fabric. The chill in the air whispers of winter, with temperatures climbing slowly toward a high that barely grazes the freezing point. Clouds hover, yet they are not stubbornly gray—the hint of brightness hints at the possibility of afternoon clarity, a gift for those who venture outdoors. As evening beckons, the skies are set to clear, offering a glimpse into the deep stillness of the night and inviting the contemplative soul to reflect under a gently shimmering canopy. 

For those seeking comfort amid the cool embrace of the day, layering is key. A warm coat, perhaps complemented by a snug scarf, will shield against the brisk northwest winds that weave through the streets. As the sun begins to dip, embrace the evening with a warm drink in hand, perhaps exploring nearby cafés or taking a quiet walk along the Esplanade. The sights and sounds of the city will transform into a gentle lullaby, perfect for those who wish to savor the tranquil beauty of a winter evening in Boston.
